title: TRANSPORTATION – Amends and adds to existing law to establish provisions regarding the use of automated license plate readers and their data and to provide for vehicles equipped with front license plate mounting brackets.
subject: GOVERNMENT
LAW ENFORCEMENT
LICENSE PLATES
MOTOR VEHICLES
TRANSPORTATION
